message.body: Ah it was ok!
ï¿¼
Here's a nerdy pic of us at it
Ps I place 6 months of rent checks in the drawer actually and just post dated them
The pic is awesome! You guys look really happy. Glad to hear the show was fun. Please tell Alec that I said Hi.
Did you leave a check for the utilities in the drawer also? Thank you!
Yes and I left 6 months of post dated checks for you too!!
Awesome. Thanks.
I post dated them for the 6th of every month so id never forget
Lol so just cash them every 6th? Is that ok? Bc I get paid the 1st
So that gives me a few days

Yup. That's great. I sent Kevin a text explaining to him. Just a small caveat. Jo told me awhile ago that you can deposit post dated checks anytime. She ran into an issue awhile ago with it. Some miscommunication with her dentist.
Cindy is supposed to come by again today. Can you leave your bedroom door unlocked?
After this if you get bit again then I'm calling in the other company.
And again. I am SO SORRY that this is still going on. But Sorry's don't mean much. I have to get rid of those little bastards one way or the other.
Yes you could deposit them any time but you don't seem like a jerk lol so I just took that chance
Also you can talk to your bank to ask them to not allow it until a certain day but I trust you that you will cash them in on the month they are due
I just kept forgetting to drop the check off so this seemed easier bc then you'd always have it on time
Yup my room is open
Yeah. Your good. I sent Kevin this - Ingrid left a rent & a utility check. And she also left 6 months of rent checks in the drawer and just post dated them
And then this -- Obv - Pls do not deposit post dated checks until the appropriate month.
Anyway I really appreciate it.
I think it used to be you couldn't deposit a post dated check but apparently now you can.
Yay perfect
Come visit! Bring Alec!
Omg we will!!!
We both need a vacation
Kaushal said he might come after graduation in April.
